issue.title: Installation instructions for pyarrow
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-240](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-240). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
It would be great to have updated installations to build the pyarrow project.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-240?focusedCommentId=15668381) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
Note that `pip install` will only work after the next Arrow release.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-240?focusedCommentId=15898487) by Aravindh Varadharaju (avaradharaju):*
Is pip install available in the current release? pip install complains that it is not able to find pyarrow distribution.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-240?focusedCommentId=15898577) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
I know that `[~xhochy]` is still working on it. I recommend installing with conda for now

`conda install pyarrow -c conda-forge`

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-240?focusedCommentId=15898638) by Aravindh Varadharaju (avaradharaju):*
Thank you very much Wes. I will go ahead with conda.

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-240?focusedCommentId=15898903) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
`[~avaradharaju]` The wheel is just waiting for the first release of parquet-cpp. Then I'll upload Linux wheels to PyPI. OSX wheels will come with 0.3 which should hopefully land end of the month.
